articles.description: YouTube star Sophia Grace Brownlee, 19, has given birth to her first child, sharing a picture of her newborn's hand on Instagram on Sunday.
articles.content:
YouTube star Sophia Grace Brownlee has given birth to her first child.
The 19-year-old was rocketed to fame when she became a viral sensation after appearing on the Ellen DeGeneres Show as an eight-… [+3445 chars]

articles.author: Edward Segarra, USA TODAY
articles.title: Paris Hilton on celebrity sex tape released before 'The Simple Life' - USA TODAY
articles.description: In an excerpt, published by Sunday Times, of her new memoir, Paris Hilton gets candid about the sex tape she made with boyfriend Rick Salomon in 2000.
articles.content:
Roll the tape: Paris Hilton is sounding off on the infamous sex tape that helped launch her to fame in the early 2000s.
In an excerpt of her upcoming book "Paris: The Memoir," (out March 14), publis… [+3522 chars]
